title: Wall
description: A two-dimensional wall defined as a line strip and optional maximum and minimum heights, which conforms to the curvature of the globe and can be placed along the surface or at altitude.

show.description: Whether or not the wall is shown.

positions.description: The array of positions defining the centerline of the wall.

minimumHeights.description: The list of heights to be used for the bottom of the wall, instead of the surface.

maximumHeights.description: The list of heights to be used for the top of the wall, instead of the height of each position.

fill.description: Whether or not the wall is filled.

material.description: The material to display on the surface of the wall.

outline.description: Whether or not the wall is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the wall outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the wall outline.

shadows.description: Whether or not the wall casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying at what distance from the camera this wall will be displayed.
